data.text: Paul li Silas in Amphipolis khat-um Apollonia inrakaanna, Jihudi ngai synagogue omna Thessalonia katung inheiwajei.
Halli Paul in ama ithojol angnga synagogue khan aleisi, Jihudi ngai sernikhuo woithum katung Pathian chongnga inmanile alei-inseiipui.
Christa in apoong sik halli kathiya inphut ahongringsik eii iti chonghi inmani diang arilcheenpiya, hiwa Jisu hi eii kei'n nangnidiang kinarilpi Christa kha, aleitipi.
Halli inmani karra lekkhat, Pathian chubei katho Greek mipui katam khat, khat-um numeisa ngai karra lamkakei katam khat in Pathian inngamna ah Paul li Silas diang inlei-inchunjei.

Takkha Jihudi lekkhat in inleira-ot, halli chuon kaneimak ngai karra tu ka-ang kathamak mi ngaikha inkoituup ah, khuopuikha inleiminhaang; halli inmani'n Jason innkhan Paul li Silas kha inratok ah inmani kha mipui ngaidiang keisuonasik inlei-entok.

Halli inmani'n inmani kha inmumak phakhan, Jason li ule-nai Pathian ka-ngamna lekkhat ngaikha khuopui karoon ngai maikuungnga inkei-karuolla, inkheek ah inheiti, manmasituol kamalet-kamakhup mi ngaikha hiwa eini khuopui hin inheiwa;
halli inmani kha Jason in a-inna aleikeiluut, halli Jisu inti reng inkhat aom intia inmani rakip in Caesar dan ngaikha inleimakoi.
Mipui ngaile khawa khuopui karoon ngai'n hiwa chonghi injet phakhan, inmalung minhaang pijei.
Halli inmani'n Jason li aleiilak ngaikha masuonasik sial inminpeya inleimasuojei.
Ule-nai ngaikhan innot-ah Paul li Silas kha zaanna Berea ah intirjei. Inmani'n khawa mun intung phakhan, Jihudi ngai synagogue khan inluutjei.

Khawa khanna mi ngaikha Thessalonia mi ngaineek-ah inmalung aleiluut, inmani'n Pathian chonghi malungkaluut ah Paul chongril ngaihi inthiangnga atuunbe intia nisuo rakip ah Pathian chongkhan katha ah inleiratok.
Khawa jarra inmani karra akatamkhat halli khuo suungnga khoya thosik kaom Greek numeisa ngaile Greek mi katamkhat in Pathian inngamnajei.
Takkha Thessalonia Jihudi ngai'n Berea khannum Paul in Pathian chong aril jei iti injetpha, inmani'n inheiwa-ah, khawa khannum mipui inmasok ah inminhaangjei.
Khawapha takkhan ule-nai ngaikhan innot-ah Paul kha tuipui katung sina sik-ah inleitirjei. takkha Silas li Timothy chu Berea ah inomjei.
Paul kathak ngaikhan Athen katung injuothakjei, halli Silas li Timothy kha innot-ah amadiang heiwanasik Paul chongpeii khale inruoiya Berea tiang inheikirjei.
Paul in Athenna Silas li Timothy ngaak-ah omlai khan, ama'n khuopui kha kutbool pathian khan isip amu pha amalung leihoipimak jei.
Khawa jarra ama'n synagogue ah Jihudi khat-um zaatlop Pathian chubei katho, nisuo rakip ah intongpui mi ngaile inruoiya phaipui mi inchunna munkhan alei-inseiipui.
woikhat-um Apicurean khat-um Stoic karu ngai lekkhatle inlei-inseiinook, halli inmani lekkhat in inti, por tia irilhi ang itizoot omme?
Khawa jarra ama kha inmani'n Areopagus koolla inhongruoiya inti, ama naminchu akathar chonghi ang tiname keini'n jet chanibo?
Ajarchu nang in keini kuorra chongleiilak niril keini'n kinjet; khawa jarra chong ngaihi ang tiname keini'n kinjetzoot.
(Ajarchu Athen mi ngai khat-um khawa munna leikaom khuol-injil mi ngai'n chongthar inril emakli inrangai eleiya iteii inkhat um tholeiya apha inleiminmang.)
Paul in mi intuupna Areopagus laiya angirra ati: Athen mi ngai, nangni lamrakip ah pathian kangamnathei ning eii ti kei'n kajet.

Ajarchu kei'n hin khuopuiya kasipha, nangni ngai chubei thona mun ngaikha katha ah ka-enna, “Injetmak Pathian diang” tia maichaam inkhat chungnga injia kha-um kamujei. Khawa jarra nangni'n jetleiya ningbiak Pathian kha kei'n nangni diang kinarilpi eii.
Nuoipil pumpui khat-um khawa suungnga kaom phur rakip kabool Pathian khan, Marwaan li nuoipil Pumi ejarra, kut ah inbool biak-inn khan ommak. 1 Reng 8:27; Isa 42:5; Chuon 7:48
Ama sik-ah insam om tia miring kut ah ama sepa thosik ommak, ajarchu amatak in mi rakip chungnga ringkhuo, phuksaan khat-um phur rakip apeii.
Ama'n miring inkhat ah inphut miring zaat rakip hi nuoipilchung pumpui kaphuonsik ah abooljei, ama'n inmani omnasik pha khat-um in-omnasik ramri matiang khan aboolpijei.
Tichu, inmani'n Pathian kha khan mukinte tia in-entok nasik eii; takkha eini rakip diangnga inphut amachu kalaak ah ommak.
Ajarchu amadiang eini niring, nisi-nihong halli eini'n niring,
Khawa jarra eini Pathian sangai ni-ejarra, miring ngai singna theina khanna inbool soonna, dangka emakli lungnga inhak Pathian kha eini'n biaktheinumin.
Mi ngai'n Pathian inleijetmaklai phakhan, Pathian in iteii teelpimak, takkha tuunchu amun rakip ah miring rakip malung-thonnasik ama'n chong apejei.

Ajarchu ama'n ikadang mi inkhat in manmasituol hi akatuuntak ah chongtan nasik nikhuo inkhat amadanna adajei. Ama'n miring thiya inphut aminringna khan miring rakip diang inngamnasik ka-eii kha ama'n apejei.
Paul in thina ah inphut hongringna chong jarra irilhi inmani'n injetpha, lekkhat in in-innuipui, halli lekkhat inchu inti, hiwajarhi keini'n woikhat nadiangnga inphut kinrangaizoot inti.
Paul in hinthoa inmani karra inphut asuokjei.
Takkha mi lekkhat in amakha inngamnajei, inmani uparup karra ka-inchel Areopagite Dionysius, halli mileiilak ngai karra Damaris inti numeisa inkhat um khawakhan alei-inchel.
